column4: hi, im trying to install the lastest nvidia drivers for my 8800 GT card, its saying i need to close X before i can install how do i do this ?
with the script from nvidia site
well stop trying to run the .run file, its dangerous
what card, what drivers what version of ubuntu, your /etx/X11/xorg.conf and your /var/log/Xorg.0.log please
my card is a geforce 8800 GT
and the rest of the info?
you are using the nvidia driver
are you running compiz at the same time?
you need to switch to metacity first
i.e. try it with compiz of
what type of game are you looking for?
new games are unlikely to work on linux
